query:
SELECT g.id, g.nome, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as total_lojas
FROM gestores g
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON gl.gestorId = g.id
WHERE g.nome LIKE '%Fabio%' OR g.nome LIKE '%Fábio%'
GROUP BY g.id, g.nome;
